product.name: Bathroom Vanity Light Brushed Nickel Square LED 24 inch 14W 4000K Natural White Light Wall Bar Lighting Fixtures Over Mirror
product.description:
Nickel LED Vanity Light
Mate Black  Vanity Light
Gold LED Vanity Light
Crystal LED Vanity Light
Black Vanity Light
Black Brass Vanity Light
Black LED Vanity Light
When it burn out,Can the LED bulb be replaced?
It can NOT be replaced because it is LED SMD 2835 lamp beads. The average life  is 25000h
Can it be installed vertically?
Yes, Whether it is horizontal or vertical.
I did not receive my package, or the product is damaged, what should I do？
For issues such as product delivery and timeliness,please send message to us, we will give you the best solution within 24 hours
product.bullet_points:
• 【Original Design 】Own US Patent Certificate，Modern design, brushed nickel base and white acrylic. For bedroom, it is a wonderful makeup vanity light. As the bathroom vanity light, it works well too.
• 【Specifications】Length:24inch for 14w, backplate: 4.33*4.33in. Voltage: 85-265V; Color Temperature: 4000k,Soft light.
• 【Energy saving and safety 】2835SMD creates stable and efficient light. These vanity mirror lights give soft up and down light. The same 24inch, it is 20W, brighter. There are ROHS, IP44 Waterproof and CE/FCC certified for the LED power driver.LED saves up to 80% less electricity than conventional light bulbs.
• 【Easy for installation 】 No switch or cord on the light. JUST Connect to the reserved wire directly,Suitable US junction box standard.
• 【After-Sales Service】 When you receive products have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will give you the best solution within 24 hours, allowing you to rest assured shopping.REMINDER: This item can use coupon,to save money.
